title: patch 6.2 zed bug
body: Gday everyone just reporting a bug and didn't know where to do it. but last game i played zed and was dominating and realized  if zeilian ulted me after i used my ulti the cd would be refunded entirely so ya zed with 2 ults kinda bs

replies.body:
Hey there,

Bug reports are better suited for the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board over on the NA site.
